activities:
Data can be used to analyze markets, adoption trends and firm characteristics to assist in the development of strategic business and/or marketing plans for our clients’ internal use only.  Data may also be gathered to sort and segment prospect/customer lists for lead generation for our clients’ information and use only.
At no time do we sell or disclose any personal or proprietary information gained from any research source.

recoursemech:
Our organization agrees to cooperate with the DPAs by declaring that it: 
1. Elects to commits to cooperate with the DPAs; 
2. Will cooperate with the DPAs in the investigation and resolution of complaints brought under the Safe Harbor 
3. Will comply with any advice given by the DPAs where the DPAs take the view that the organization needs to take specific action to comply with the Safe Harbor Principles, including remedial or compensatory measures for the benefit of individuals affected by any non-compliance with the Principles, and will provide the DPAs with written confirmation that such action has been taken.
